content:
Hi there! I’m a 27-year-old software engineer originally from the Netherlands, now embracing a new chapter of life in Australia. I recently made the exciting move to this beautiful country to live with my long-term partner and start building our future together.

This website is a reflection of my passion for software engineering and a platform to showcase some of the skills I’ve developed over the years. Whether it’s crafting clean code, solving complex problems, or exploring new technologies, I love the creativity and logic that comes with this field.

Moving to a new country has been both challenging and rewarding, and I’m eager to establish myself here, both personally and professionally. I’m excited to contribute to the tech community in Australia while continuing to grow and learn as an engineer.

Thanks for stopping by, and I hope you enjoy exploring my work as much as I enjoy creating it! Let’s connect and see where this journey takes us.
